properties.description: This form is used to enter "metadata" or descriptive information about your Collection. For help on how to enter information, consult the how-to document on the CTDA web site Resources for Participants.
properties.title: Collection Level MODS FORM

properties.description: This title is the same one you entered when you created your Collection, after clicking on "Add an object to this Collection" and filled in the field called "Collection Label".
properties.title: Title (Required)

properties.description: Use Your Local List or Try Searching Library of Congress Linked Authorities and Vocabularies
properties.title: Creator/Contributor Information (Recommended If Applicable)

properties.description: Select person, corporate. conference/meeting or family
properties.title: Name Type

properties.description: Enter last name first and then first name separated by a comma, i.e. Smith, John or Daffy, M. C. (Mildred C.), 1945-.
properties.title: Creator/Contributor

properties.description: Use LC Relator Terms. Examples include: Creator, Photographer, Artist. NOT USED FOR NAME SUBJECTS.
properties.title: Role (Use terms, Creator or Contributor, to distinguish role played)

properties.description: Select ONLY ONE from the drop down list. For Collection with multiple formats, select "mixed material".
properties.title: Resource Type (Required)

properties.description: Best practice is to add a W3CDTF date format or YYYY, or YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD. You may qualify the date with "approximate", "inferred" or "questionable"
properties.title: Enter A Single Date

properties.description: Best practice is to add a W3CDTF date format or YYYY, or YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD. You may qualify the date with "approximate", "inferred" or "questionable"
properties.title: Enter A Date Range

properties.description: Enter whether the resource was digitized (reformatted digital) or born digital.
properties.title: Digital Origin (Required)

properties.description: Use Your Local List or Try Search Library of Congress Linked Authorities and Vocabularies
Enter the coordinates corresponding to the smallest geographic area or the address provided.
properties.title: Coordinates

options.hdl: Handle - DO NOT REMOVE OR ADD DATA HERE

properties.description: Enter a statement on use and re-use of the resource
properties.title: Rights

properties.description: Enter the name of the organization or person creating this MODS record
properties.title: Who Created This MODS Record?
